home.title: Francis Berrier
home.subtitle: Web Developper
home.introText: After years working on movie industry, I am now a fresh web developper, eager to discover new projects en challenges with you. Let's get acquainted!

cards.title: React
cards.text: For building reactive and dynamic websites and web applications using React and Next.js, combining server-side rendering for optimal performance with client-side rendering for dynamic parts.

cards.title: Sass
cards.text: For modular and flexible style management, enabling a clear and reusable code structure that simplifies CSS handling in complex projects.

cards.title: Express.js
cards.text: To create secure and robust APIs, compatible with many tools and libraries, allowing fast development of maintainable and production-ready APIs.

homeContact.title: Open to New Challenges:
homeContact.subtitle: Let's connect and explore how we can achieve your goals together
homeContact.text: If you have any questions, a job offer, or a project to discuss, feel free to get in touch. I'm excited to explore new opportunities with you.

bioContent.paragraphe1: After nearly twenty years in the film industry, I had the opportunity to work on many well-known movies, holding various positions in sound design. This rich and demanding career taught me discipline, autonomy, teamwork, and full commitment to artistic projects.
bioContent.paragraphe2: Driven by the desire to take on new challenges and find a better balance with family life, I started a career shift into web development. Initially self-taught, I quickly solidified my skills through the OpenClassrooms Web Developer training program, which covered both frontend (React, Sass) and backend (Node.js, Express) technologies.
bioContent.paragraphe3: Today, I bring the same high standards and dedication to my code: curious, persistent, and fully invested in every project, I keep learning every day to become a reliable, adaptable developer who listens closely to both the team and the users.

cinema.title: Cinema
cinema.text: During my career in the film industry, I worked for over 15 years in various roles involved in the sound production of a film, from shooting to post-production. These experiences allowed me to develop discipline and dedication within a team, as well as autonomy and creativity in service of a project. If you’d like to learn more about this work, feel free to explore my filmography.

code.title: Web Developpement
code.text: During my training, I gained experience by developing several learning projects that helped me strengthen my web development skills. To get a better idea of my abilities, check out my work and the code available on GitHub.

aboutExperienceCinema.title: Career Background

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.introText: For your questions, job offer or project you want to propose, contact me. I'm looking forward to new horizons with you.
